trans-unit.source: In another browser window or tab, go to the [Azure preview portal](https://portal.azure.com).
trans-unit.target: In another browser window or tab, go to the [Azure preview portal](https://portal.azure.com).

trans-unit.source: Go to the **API App** blade for your Dropbox connector.
trans-unit.target: Go to the **API App** blade for your Dropbox connector.

trans-unit.source: (If you're still on the **Resource Group** blade, just click the Dropbox connector in the diagram.)
trans-unit.target: (If you're still on the **Resource Group** blade, just click the Dropbox connector in the diagram.)

trans-unit.source: Click **Settings**, and in the **Settings** blade click **Authentication**.
trans-unit.target: Click **Settings**, and in the **Settings** blade click **Authentication**.

trans-unit.source: In the Authentication blade, enter the client ID and client secret from the Dropbox site, and then click **Save**.
trans-unit.target: In the Authentication blade, enter the client ID and client secret from the Dropbox site, and then click **Save**.

trans-unit.source: Copy the **Redirect URI** (the grey box above the client ID and client secret) and add the value to the page you left open in the previous step.
trans-unit.target: Copy the **Redirect URI** (the grey box above the client ID and client secret) and add the value to the page you left open in the previous step.

trans-unit.source: The redirect URI follows this pattern:
trans-unit.target: The redirect URI follows this pattern:
